items.title: Fill in customer info in the summary section
Send [overview doc](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1EY_e0e_t26ft7djXSmPPG-KaRRFeReFEPa_X15i-aho/edit#) to customer and confirm interest
If customer isn't already on community, ask them to [create an account here](https://mattermost.com/community/)
Add all interested customer users to this dedicated channel
Schedule a kickoff call for the customer with @tao
Confirm plugin installation on customer's own instance
Confirm using server version v6.3 or later
Confirm using iOS/Android app v1.49 or later
Confirm using desktop app v5.04 or later
Document expected use cases and adoption level
Two weeks after kickoff, review telemetry dashboard for usage
If inactive, thank the customer and then end by finishing the playbook run
Perform and publish retro as a team

description:
This walks each customer through the closed beta process as well as creates a space to collaborate and share feedback with us.

**Important: Keep in mind that this playbook is public on the Contributor team. Although the content of the channel will be private however overview and status updates will technically be visible to anyone.**
message_on_join:
Hello and welcome to the Calls closed beta! 

This channel is where you can collaborate and share feedback with our team throughout the beta program. Here is [an overview document with FAQ](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1EY_e0e_t26ft7djXSmPPG-KaRRFeReFEPa_X15i-aho/edit#) that can provide more context.

metrics.description: How long did it take to get the customer setup and running? If the customer never engaged, use time until decision to end the beta for them.
metrics.title: Time to rollout

retrospective_template:
### Summarized learnings
Fill in this section after each participant have shared their perspectives below.

### Participant survey

#### <Participant name>
**What surprised you?**

**What went as you expected?**

**What should we do differently next time?**

**Resources**

title: Calls Team: Closed Beta
